main event: On November 7, 1969, a witness sighted a bright light in the sky near Dayton, Ohio, which exhibited rapid movement before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes,It was oval shaped and metallic gray in color, about 50 feet in diameter, it initially appeared to move slowly and silently at an altitude of about 10,000 feet,The object made sudden changes in direction and speed,The case was classified as unidentified due to lack of evidence.
sighted object: a bright, oval-shaped, metallic gray object
witness description: a civilian observer who requested to remain anonymous
